mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM agile_issue ai, agile_issue_sprint_rel aisr WHERE ai.project_id = #{projectId} AND aisr.issue_id = ai.issue_id AND aisr.sprint_id = #{sprintId} AND type_code in ('story', 'task', 'bug')
mapper.sql: SELECT sp.sprint_id, sp.sprint_name, sp.sprint_goal, start_date, sp.end_date, status_code, sp.object_version_number FROM agile_sprint sp WHERE sp.project_id = #{projectId} AND sp.status_code = 'started'
mapper.select: select spa.* from ()spa

SELECT cc.asi_sprint_id as sprint_id, cc.asi_assignee_id as assignee_id, cc.total_story_points, cc.total_remaining_time, cc.issue_count, bb.remaining_story_points, bb.remaining_time, bb.remaining_issue_count FROM ( SELECT a.sprint_id AS asi_sprint_id, a.assignee_id AS asi_assignee_id, SUM( a.story_points ) AS total_story_points, SUM( a.remaining_time ) AS total_remaining_time, COUNT( 1 ) AS issue_count FROM ( SELECT aii.sprint_id, CASE WHEN ai.assignee_id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE ai.assignee_id END AS assignee_id, ai.story_points, (ai.remaining_time + IFNULL(wl.work_time,0)) as remaining_time FROM agile_issue ai JOIN () aii on ai.issue_id = aii.issue_id LEFT JOIN ( select wl1.issue_id, SUM(wl1.work_time) as work_time from agile_work_log wl1, (
) aii where wl1.project_id = #{projectId} and wl1.issue_id = aii.issue_id group by wl1.issue_id ) wl ON ai.issue_id = wl.issue_id WHERE ai.project_id = #{projectId} ) a GROUP BY a.sprint_id, a.assignee_id ) cc LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a2.sprint_id AS asi_sprint_id, a2.assignee_id AS asi_assignee_id, SUM( a2.story_points ) AS remaining_story_points, SUM( a2.remaining_time ) AS remaining_time, COUNT( 1 ) AS remaining_issue_count FROM ( SELECT aii.sprint_id, CASE WHEN ai2.assignee_id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE ai2.assignee_id END AS assignee_id, ai2.story_points, ai2.remaining_time FROM agile_issue ai2 JOIN agile_issue_status ais on ai2.project_id = ais.project_id AND ai2.status_id = ais.status_id, () aii WHERE aii.issue_id = ai2.issue_id AND ais.is_completed != 1 ) a2 GROUP BY a2.sprint_id, a2.assignee_id ) bb ON cc.asi_assignee_id = bb.asi_assignee_id and cc.asi_sprint_id = bb.asi_sprint_id order by cc.asi_assignee_id

SELECT cc.sprint_id, cc.assignee_id, cc.total_story_points, cc.total_remaining_time, cc.issue_count, bb.remaining_story_points, bb.remaining_time, bb.remaining_issue_count FROM ( SELECT a.sprint_id, a.assignee_id, SUM( a.story_points ) AS total_story_points, SUM( a.remaining_time ) AS total_remaining_time, COUNT( 1 ) AS issue_count FROM ( SELECT aisr.sprint_id, CASE WHEN ai.assignee_id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE ai.assignee_id END AS assignee_id, ai.story_points, ai.remaining_time FROM agile_issue ai, agile_issue_sprint_rel aisr WHERE aisr.issue_id = ai.issue_id AND aisr.project_id = #{projectId} AND aisr.sprint_id = #{sprintId} ) a GROUP BY a.assignee_id ) cc LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a2.sprint_id, a2.assignee_id, SUM( a2.story_points ) AS remaining_story_points, SUM( a2.remaining_time ) AS remaining_time, COUNT( 1 ) AS remaining_issue_count FROM ( SELECT aisr.sprint_id, CASE WHEN ai2.assignee_id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE ai2.assignee_id END AS assignee_id, ai2.story_points, ai2.remaining_time FROM agile_issue ai2, agile_issue_sprint_rel aisr WHERE aisr.issue_id = ai2.issue_id AND aisr.project_id = #{projectId} AND aisr.sprint_id = #{sprintId} AND ai2.status_id IN ( SELECT ais.status_id FROM agile_issue_status ais WHERE ais.project_id = #{projectId} AND ais.is_completed != 1 ) ) a2 GROUP BY a2.assignee_id ) bb ON cc.assignee_id = bb.assignee_id order by cc.assignee_id
mapper.sql:
SELECT ai2.issue_id, IF(ai2.issue_num IS NULL, NULL, CONCAT_WS('-', api.project_code, ai2.issue_num)) AS issue_num, ai2.summary, ai2.rank, ai2.reporter_id, ai2.assignee_id, ai2.project_id, ai2.epic_id, aisr2.sprint_id as is_sprint_id, ai2.story_points, ai2.status_id, ai2.issue_type_id, ai2.priority_id, ai2.estimated_start_time, ai2.estimated_end_time, ai2.object_version_number as is_object_version_number, ai2.priority_code, ai1.epic_name AS issue_epic_name, alv2.name AS color, -- feature_info.feature_name AS feature_name, apv1.version_id AS version_id, apv1.name AS version_name FROM (select * from agile_issue ai4 WHERE ai4.project_id = #{projectId} AND ai4.type_code in ('story','task','bug') AND ai4.issue_id in
#{issueId} )ai2 LEFT JOIN agile_project_info api ON ai2.project_id = api.project_id LEFT JOIN agile_issue ai1 ON ai2.epic_id = ai1.issue_id -- LEFT JOIN ( -- select -- ai3.issue_id as issue_id, -- ai3.summary as feature_name -- from agile_issue ai3, agile_feature af -- where ai3.type_code = 'feature' -- and ai3.issue_id = af.issue_id -- ) feature_info ON ai2.feature_id = feature_info.issue_id LEFT JOIN lookup_value alv2 ON ai1.color_code = alv2.value_code left join agile_issue_sprint_rel aisr2 on aisr2.issue_id = ai2.issue_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT avir.version_id, avir.issue_id, apv.NAME FROM agile_version_issue_rel avir LEFT JOIN agile_product_version apv ON avir.version_id = apv.version_id where avir.relation_type = 'fix' ) apv1 ON apv1.issue_id = ai2.issue_id where aisr2.sprint_id in (SELECT asp2.sprint_id FROM agile_sprint asp2 WHERE aisr2.sprint_id = asp2.sprint_id AND asp2.status_code = 'sprint_planning')
mapper.select: SELECT ai.assignee_id FROM agile_issue ai WHERE ai.project_id = #{projectId} AND ai.issue_id IN ( SELECT aisr.issue_id FROM agile_issue_sprint_rel aisr WHERE aisr.sprint_id IN ( SELECT asp.sprint_id FROM agile_sprint asp WHERE asp.project_id = #{projectId} AND asp.status_code != 'closed' ) ) AND ai.assignee_id IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT ai.assignee_id FROM agile_issue ai WHERE ai.project_id = #{projectId} AND ai.type_code = 'sub_task' AND ai.parent_issue_id IN ( SELECT aisr.issue_id FROM agile_issue_sprint_rel aisr WHERE aisr.sprint_id IN ( SELECT asp.sprint_id FROM agile_sprint asp WHERE asp.project_id = #{projectId} AND asp.status_code != 'closed' ) ) AND ai.assignee_id IS NOT NULL

SELECT ai2.issue_id, IF(ai2.issue_num IS NULL, NULL, CONCAT_WS('-', api.project_code, ai2.issue_num)) AS issue_num, ai2.summary, ai2.rank, ai2.reporter_id, ai2.assignee_id, ai2.project_id, ai2.epic_id, #{sprintId} as is_sprint_id, ai2.story_points, ai2.status_id, ai2.issue_type_id, ai2.priority_id, ai2.object_version_number as is_object_version_number, ai2.priority_code, ai2.estimated_start_time, ai2.estimated_end_time, IF(ai2.parent_issue_id IS NULL OR ai2.parent_issue_id = 0, (IF(ai2.relate_issue_id IS NULL OR ai2.relate_issue_id = 0, null, ai2.relate_issue_id)), ai2.parent_issue_id) as parent_id, -- ai2.feature_id, ai1.epic_name AS issue_epic_name, alv2.name AS color, -- feature_info.feature_name AS feature_name, apv1.version_id AS version_id, apv1.name AS version_name FROM (select * from agile_issue ai4 WHERE ai4.project_id = #{projectId} AND ai4.issue_id in
#{issueId} )ai2 LEFT JOIN agile_project_info api ON ai2.project_id = api.project_id LEFT JOIN agile_issue ai1 ON ai2.epic_id = ai1.issue_id -- LEFT JOIN ( -- select -- ai3.issue_id as issue_id, -- ai3.summary as feature_name -- from agile_issue ai3, agile_feature af -- where ai3.type_code = 'feature' -- and ai3.issue_id = af.issue_id -- ) feature_info ON ai2.feature_id = feature_info.issue_id LEFT JOIN lookup_value alv2 ON ai1.color_code = alv2.value_code LEFT JOIN ( SELECT avir.version_id, avir.issue_id, apv.NAME FROM agile_version_issue_rel avir LEFT JOIN agile_product_version apv ON avir.version_id = apv.version_id where avir.relation_type = 'fix') apv1 ON apv1.issue_id = ai2.issue_id order by ai2.rank asc
mapper.sql: SELECT sp.sprint_id, sp.sprint_name, sp.sprint_goal, start_date, sp.end_date, status_code, sp.object_version_number FROM agile_sprint sp WHERE sp.project_id = #{projectId} AND sp.status_code = 'sprint_planning'
mapper.select: select spa.*, qsii.* from ()spa left join()qsii on qsii.is_sprint_id = spa.sprint_id order by spa.sprint_id DESC,qsii.rank ASC
select spa.sprint_id, spa.sprint_name, spa.sprint_goal, spa.start_date, spa.end_date, spa.status_code, spa.object_version_number from ()spa order by spa.sprint_id DESC

SELECT aisr.sprint_id FROM agile_issue_sprint_rel aisr LEFT JOIN agile_sprint asp ON asp.sprint_id = aisr.sprint_id WHERE aisr.issue_id = #{issueId} and asp.status_code != 'closed' and aisr.project_id = #{projectId}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM agile_issue ai, agile_issue_status ais, agile_issue_sprint_rel aisr WHERE ai.project_id = #{projectId} AND aisr.issue_id = ai.issue_id AND aisr.sprint_id = #{sprintId} AND ai.type_code in ('story', 'task', 'bug', 'sub_task') AND ai.status_id = ais.status_id and ai.project_id = ais.project_id AND ais.is_completed != 1

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM agile_issue ai, agile_issue_status ais, agile_issue_sprint_rel aisr WHERE ai.project_id = #{projectId} AND aisr.issue_id = ai.issue_id AND aisr.sprint_id = #{sprintId} AND ai.type_code in ('story', 'task', 'bug', 'sub_task') AND ai.status_id = ais.status_id and ai.project_id = ais.project_id AND ais.is_completed = 1
SELECT sprint_id, sprint_name FROM agile_sprint WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND status_code = 'sprint_planning'
SELECT sprint_id, sprint_name, start_date, end_date, project_id FROM agile_sprint WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND status_code = 'started'

select CASE COUNT(1) WHEN 0 THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END from agile_issue ai where ai.project_id = #{projectId} AND ai.type_code in ('story', 'task', 'bug') and ai.apply_type = 'agile' and ai.issue_id
in (SELECT aisr1.issue_id FROM agile_issue_sprint_rel aisr1, agile_sprint asp WHERE aisr1.project_id = #{projectId} AND aisr1.sprint_id = asp.sprint_id AND asp.status_code != 'closed' AND aisr1.sprint_id = #{sprintId})
not in (SELECT aisr1.issue_id FROM agile_issue_sprint_rel aisr1, agile_sprint asp WHERE aisr1.project_id = #{projectId} AND aisr1.sprint_id = asp.sprint_id AND asp.status_code != 'closed' )

select MAX(ai.rank) from agile_issue ai where ai.project_id = #{projectId} AND ai.type_code in ('story', 'task', 'bug') and ai.apply_type = 'agile' and ai.issue_id
in(SELECT aisr1.issue_id FROM agile_issue_sprint_rel aisr1, agile_sprint asp WHERE aisr1.project_id = #{projectId} AND aisr1.sprint_id = asp.sprint_id AND asp.status_code != 'closed' AND aisr1.sprint_id = #{sprintId})
not in (SELECT aisr1.issue_id FROM agile_issue_sprint_rel aisr1, agile_sprint asp WHERE aisr1.project_id = #{projectId} AND aisr1.sprint_id = asp.sprint_id AND asp.status_code != 'closed' )
SELECT COUNT(sprint_id) FROM agile_sprint WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND status_code = 'started'
SELECT * FROM agile_sprint WHERE sprint_id = ( SELECT MAX(sprint_id) FROM agile_sprint WHERE project_id = #{projectId} )

SELECT ai.issue_id FROM agile_issue ai, agile_issue_status ais, agile_issue_sprint_rel aisr WHERE ai.project_id = #{projectId} AND aisr.issue_id = ai.issue_id AND aisr.sprint_id = #{sprintId} AND ai.type_code in ('story', 'task', 'bug') AND ai.status_id = ais.status_id and ai.project_id = ais.project_id AND ais.is_completed != 1 ORDER BY rank DESC

SELECT ai.issue_id FROM agile_issue ai, agile_issue_sprint_rel aisr WHERE ai.project_id = #{projectId} AND aisr.issue_id = ai.issue_id AND aisr.sprint_id = #{sprintId} AND ai.type_code in ('story', 'task', 'bug') ORDER BY rank DESC

SELECT ai.issue_id, CONCAT_WS('-', api.project_code, ai.issue_num) AS issue_num, ai.project_id FROM agile_issue ai LEFT JOIN agile_project_info api ON ai.project_id = api.project_id, agile_issue_status ais, agile_issue_sprint_rel aisr WHERE ai.project_id = #{projectId} AND aisr.issue_id = ai.issue_id AND aisr.sprint_id = #{sprintId} AND ai.status_id = ais.status_id and ai.project_id = ais.project_id AND ais.is_completed = 1 AND ai.issue_id IN (SELECT ai2.parent_issue_id FROM agile_issue ai2, agile_issue_status ais2, agile_issue_sprint_rel aisr2 WHERE ai2.project_id = #{projectId} AND aisr2.issue_id = ai2.issue_id AND aisr2.sprint_id = #{sprintId} AND ai2.type_code = 'sub_task' AND ai2.status_id = ais2.status_id and ai2.project_id = ais2.project_id AND ais2.is_completed != 1 )

SELECT ai.issue_id FROM agile_issue ai, agile_issue_status ais, agile_issue_sprint_rel aisr WHERE ai.project_id = #{projectId} AND aisr.issue_id = ai.issue_id AND aisr.sprint_id = #{sprintId} AND ai.type_code in ('story', 'task', 'bug') AND ai.status_id = ais.status_id and ai.project_id = ais.project_id AND ais.is_completed != 1
SELECT sprint_id, sprint_name FROM agile_sprint WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND status_code != 'closed' order by sprint_id

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM agile_issue ai, agile_issue_sprint_rel aisr WHERE ai.project_id = #{projectId} AND aisr.issue_id = ai.issue_id AND aisr.sprint_id = #{sprintId} AND ai.type_code in ('story', 'task', 'bug') and ai.apply_type = 'agile'
SELECT sprint_id, status_code, sprint_name FROM agile_sprint WHERE project_id = #{projectId} order by sprint_id
select * from agile_sprint where project_id = #{projectId} and status_code != 'closed' order by sprint_id

SELECT sp.sprint_id, sp.sprint_name, sp.sprint_goal, start_date, sp.end_date, status_code, sp.object_version_number FROM agile_sprint sp WHERE sp.project_id = #{projectId} AND sp.status_code = 'sprint_planning' order by sp.sprint_id DESC

SELECT aii.sprint_id as id, SUM(CASE WHEN fs.type = 'done' then IFNULL(ai.story_points,0) ELSE 0 END) as doneStoryPoint, SUM(CASE WHEN fs.type = 'doing' then IFNULL(ai.story_points,0) ELSE 0 END) as doingStoryPoint, SUM(CASE WHEN fs.type = 'todo' then IFNULL(ai.story_points,0) ELSE 0 END) as todoStoryPoint FROM agile_issue ai JOIN (
) aii on ai.issue_id = aii.issue_id LEFT JOIN agile_issue_status ais on ais.project_id = ai.project_id and ais.status_id = ai.status_id LEFT JOIN fd_status fs on fs.id = ais.status_id WHERE ai.type_code = 'story' group by aii.sprint_id

SELECT aii.assignee_id FROM (
) aii WHERE aii.assignee_id IS NOT NULL AND aii.assignee_id != 0
